'''Helen Zbihlyj''', also known as '''HelenAngel''', is a former community manager for {{MC}} at [[Mojang Studios]], the first person in the company with that title. She is now the Narrative Writer & Director of Community at ReWrite Media, [[Jigarbov Productions]], & Syclone Studios.<ref name="talk comment">[[Special:Diff/1894112|Wiki edit #1894112]] by HelenAngel</ref>

== Personal life ==

Helen graduated from {{wikipedia|Germantown High School (Tennessee)|Germantown High School}}. There she was heavily involved in the [https://www.ppp.org/ award-winning theatre & television] program.<ref name="talk comment"/>

She graduated from [https://www.memphis.edu the University of Memphis] with a BA in psychology.<ref name="talk comment"/>

Her son, Nicholas, was born in November of 2000. She married Sneeza, the creator of TF2 Outpost, in June 2016. They divorced in 2021.<ref name="talk comment"/> In October 2024, she married Wes Pesetti, a developer on Bedrock at Mojang.

== Professional life ==

In the ''Minecraft'' community, Helen started as an active player and an occasional Minecraft Wiki contributor.

She joined Xbox Game Studios in November 2013 as Community Manager for the Windows 8 games portfolio, including titles such as ''Microsoft Solitaire Collection'', ''Microsoft Bingo'', ''Disney Fairies: Hidden Treasures'', and ''Hexic''. She assisted with community management of ''Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition'' and later community management of the rest of the ''Minecraft: Console Edition'' platforms.<ref>{{citation|url=https://www.mobygames.com/developer/sheet/view/developerId,621974/|title=Developer Profile Helen Casper|website=MobyGames|date=March 27, 2021}}</ref>

She officially joined Mojang Studios full-time in July 2015 to provide community management for the Minecraft franchise.<ref name="talk comment"/>
